Content.Text:
<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Like I said, it was a mistake to sell it
to you!

Hah! Some shopkeeper you are! I'll never
buy animals from you again!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
That's fine by me. I'll never sell
animals to someone like you again!
Gah... what a waste of time this was.
Hey, out my way! I'm leaving!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, it's you. What do you want?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
This has nothing to do with you. Just
leave me alone.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Don't make that face! You're acting
like I was picking on you.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Okay, okay. You win. You'll leave me
alone if I tell you about it, right?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
That guy with the bad attitude who was
in here before is a customer of mine.
<PAGE>
He came to complain about a cow I sold
to him.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
You want to know why?
<PAGE>
It seems the cow I sold him got sick.
He seems to think that I sold him a
sickly cow on purpose.
<PAGE>
I asked him how he's been looking after
the cow, and it turns out he's been
treating it really badly.
<PAGE>
So it quickly descended into a fight.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Pretty bad of him, right? He's gone now,
anyway, so everything's okay.
What about the sick cow?
You're not much of businessman

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? What was that?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Argh, you're right! I need to give some
medicine to the poor thing or it'll
be done for!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
How could I overlook that? Right, if I
run, I can still make it!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Phew, I'm worn out!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What, you're still here?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? You want to know what happened? I
took some animal medicine to him, that's
what happened.
<PAGE>
I also gave him some advice on how to
better look after the cow. It might not
make a difference but at least I tried.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
What're you smiling for, eh?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
T-Thanks for that, anyway.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
If you hadn't been here I don't think
I'd have given that poor cow a second
thought. I was so angry!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Y-You've got work to do, too, right? Go
on, get out of here! I'm busy too. See
you later.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Huh? It's nothing to do with you!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Come on, out my shop! I don't want the
likes of you in here!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Gah, what a pain!
